house_listing.house_description: Wow! That's what the neighbors say when they look at this beautifully renovated home w/brand new roof, new exterior & interior paint, new ceramic tile & carpet throughout, new kitchen w/ceramic tile floor & backsplash, freshly painted cabinets. All appliances including washer & dryer!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Club House, ColonialStyle, Fenced, Foyer, Storage Space, Tennis Court(s), Walk-InCloset(s)
